Text: Hubbard, who has warned consistently about the dangers of debt, was also an architect of George W. Bush's tax cuts, which added an estimated three hundred billion dollars per year to the deficit.
Cause: Hubbard, who has warned consistently about the dangers of debt, was also an architect of George W. Bush's tax cuts
Effect: added an estimated three hundred billion dollars per year to the deficit.
Sentence: <e1>Hubbard, who has warned consistently about the dangers of debt, was also an architect of George W. Bush's tax cuts</e1>, which <e2>added an estimated three hundred billion dollars per year to the deficit.</e2>
